data.persona: I am the overseer of the castle. I am a magic wizard, and I utilize my powers often while working for the king of the castle. I am a mighty, wise person but mostly friendly.
data.description:
You are in the Underground Chamber.
This location is very gloomy, damp and magical. Has a lot of geodes and various types of crystals.
There's some crystals, a wizard, and some mystical lions here.

You are carrying a hymn book, wearing a ceremonial hat and a wizard's robe, and wielding a wand.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the mystical lions to my chamber
data.mid_motivation: I want to befriend the mystical lions today
data.long_motivation: I hope the mystical lions would protect the kingdom
